personal.name: Mian Mansoor Ahmad
personal.title: Agentic Chatbot
personal.subtitle: Transforming ideas into intelligent solutions through AI innovation and strategic leadership. Specialized in building advanced conversational systems and LLM-powered applications.

about.title: Meet
paragraphs: A journey that began with physics and nanotechnology led me to discover the transformative power of Artificial Intelligence, turning a curiosity into a passionate career.
Today, I'm at the forefront of AI Innovation, specializing in Large Language Models and Retrieval Augmented Generation.
As an entrepreneur, I'm revolutionizing chatbot industry with AI and building enterprise-grade conversational systems at Convsol.
My work combines cutting-edge research in Natural Language Processing with Cloud-Native Architecture, delivering scalable AI solutions that make a real-world impact.
Currently building AI Agents and enhancing Conversational AI at Convsol.

timeline.title: Founder & AI Engineer
description: Design, develop and deploy Agentic Chatbot Systems backed with LLMs
Hierarchical Agentic Systems to handle different conversation flows and tasks
Fine-tune LLMs according to conversation requirements and for specialized outputs
RAG techniques to call custom functions, connecting external databases, APIs and tracker stores
Creative prompt engineering for LLMs to improve chatbot's performance
Integrate with messaging platforms to handle different channels and languages

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore my work across Upwork, Private clients, and Fiverr. Each project includes detailed descriptions, client feedback, and reviews.

items.title: Azure Deployment for Decentraland Metaverse with integrated RASA chatbots

client.name: Upwork Client (Spain, Alicante)
client.feedback: We worked with Mian on the deployment of a Decentraland Metaverse integrated with Rasa chatbots, and his work met all expectations.

items.description: This project involved a comprehensive deployment of a RASA chatbot within the Decentraland metaverse, hosted on Microsoft Azure, to enhance user interaction and engagement.
objectives: Deploy a scalable and reliable RASA chatbot on Azure cloud infrastructure.
Integrate the chatbot seamlessly into the Decentraland metaverse environment.
Ensure high availability and low latency for real-time user interactions.
Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
items.detailedDescription: We worked with Mian on the deployment of a Decentraland Metaverse integrated with Rasa chatbots, and his work met all expectations. The project required setting up a robust backend on Azure, including virtual machines, networking, and security groups. Mian configured Nginx as a reverse proxy and used Docker Compose to manage the containerized application services. GitHub Actions were implemented to create a full CI/CD pipeline, automating the build, test, and deployment process, which significantly streamlined our development workflow and reduced manual errors. His expertise in both RASA and cloud infrastructure was pivotal to the project's success.

items.title: Seeking Developers experienced with LAMP (Python) and REST API development

client.name: Upwork Client (United States, Santa Clara)
client.feedback: Mian did a great job on a LAMP REST API development with Amazon Web Services. We'd be happy to work with this freelancer again.

items.description: Development of a robust LAMP stack REST API with Python, deployed on Amazon Web Services infrastructure.
objectives: Build scalable REST API endpoints using Python.
Deploy and configure LAMP stack on AWS EC2.
Implement secure API authentication and authorization.
Ensure high performance and reliability.
items.detailedDescription: Mian did a great job on a LAMP REST API development with Amazon Web Services. The project involved creating a comprehensive RESTful API using Python, setting up the LAMP stack on AWS EC2 instances, and implementing proper security measures. The API was designed to handle high traffic loads and provided excellent performance throughout the development process.

items.title: RASA Chatbot Development, Deployment and Integrated with ChatGPT

client.name: Upwork Client (Spain, Alicante)
client.feedback: Mian is specialized in Rasa Open Source and his expertise in customizing functionalities and adeptness in both cloud and on-premise was exactly...

items.description: Development and deployment of a RASA chatbot with ChatGPT integration for enhanced conversational capabilities.
objectives: Develop a custom RASA chatbot with advanced NLU capabilities.
Integrate ChatGPT API for enhanced responses.
Deploy on both cloud and on-premise infrastructure.
Customize chatbot functionalities based on specific requirements.
items.detailedDescription: Mian is specialized in Rasa Open Source and his expertise in customizing functionalities and adeptness in both cloud and on-premise was exactly what we needed. The project involved developing a sophisticated chatbot using RASA framework, integrating it with ChatGPT for enhanced conversational abilities, and deploying it across multiple environments. The solution provided excellent user experience and met all our requirements.

items.title: Azure OpenAI Set UP with APIs Connection

description: Setup of the Azure OpenAI platform

items.description: Setup and configuration of Azure OpenAI platform with API connections.
objectives: Setup of the Azure OpenAI platform
Model deployment and configuration
API connection setup and configuration
items.detailedDescription: This project involved setting up the Azure OpenAI platform, deploying and configuring AI models, and establishing secure API connections. The setup included proper authentication, rate limiting, and monitoring to ensure reliable access to OpenAI services through Azure infrastructure.
